title: Cam Newton, Patrick Mahomes, Tom Brady, and the CFB playoff
itunes:title: Cam Newton, Patrick Mahomes, Tom Brady, and the CFB playoff
description:
Colin discusses why Carolina Panthers QB Cam Newton is like Russell Westbrook, why we shouldn't be claiming Kansas City Chiefs QB Patrick Mahomes will win the MVP so soon, the problems with the New England Patriots and why we should trust them, and the possibility of the College Football Playoff expanding. Guests include Drew Bledsoe, Rob Parker, Doug Gottlieb, Derek Fisher, and Joel Klatt.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
